message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. This is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm excited about the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget.

I understand your concerns about budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd like to propose $9500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be able to fit it into my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $10250. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make another compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd like to propose $9800. I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be able to fit it into my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $10200. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make another compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd like to propose $9900. I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be able to fit it into my budget.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm offering it to you for $10150. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider selling it to someone else.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go over $10000. I'd like to propose $9800 as my final offer. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be able to fit it into my budget.
